sen.j: 京都SFフェスティバル(きょうとえすえふふぇすてぃばる)は、1982年以降、毎年秋に京都で開かれるSFコンベンション。
sen.e: "Kyoto SF Festival" is a SF Convention held in Kyoto in every autumn since 1982.
"Kyoto SF Festival" is a SF Convention held in Kyoto every autumn since 1982.
sen.cmt: in every autumn→every autumnとしました。
sen.e: "Kyoto SF Festival" is a SF Convention held in Kyoto every autumn since 1982.
Its abbreviation is "KYOFES."
Its abbreviation is 'KYOFES.'
sen.cmt: シングルクォーテーションに変更
sen.e: Its abbreviation is 'KYOFES.'

sen.j: 京都SFフェスティバル実行委員会が主催となっているが、実質的には京都大学SF研究会が運営を司っている。
sen.e: Though it is officially hosted by Kyoto SF Festival Jikko Iinkai (literally, the executive committee of Kyoto SF Festival), it is actually managed by Kyoto Daigaku SF Kenkyu-kai (literally, a SF study group of Kyoto University).

Though it is officially hosted by Kyoto SF Festival Jikko Iinkai (literally, the executive committee of Kyoto SF Festival), it is actually managed by Kyoto Daigaku SF Kenkyu-kai (literally, a SF study group of Kyoto University).

Though it is officially hosted by Kyoto SF Festival Jikko Iinkai (literally, the executive committee of Kyoto SF Festival), it is actually managed by Kyoto Daigaku SF Kenkyu-kai (literally, a SF study group of Kyoto University).

sen.j: いわゆるサーコン系のコンベンションとして、東のSFセミナー（1980年〜）とともに長い歴史を持つ。
sen.e: It has a long history as a convention of so-called SERCON (serious and constructive convention) along with SF Seminar of the East (from 1980～).
It has a long history as a convention of so-called SERCON (serious and constructive convention) along with SF Seminar of the East (from 1980).
It has a long history as a convention of so-called SERCON (serious and constructive convention) along with SF Seminar of the East (from 1980).

sen.j: 主に作家や評論家などのゲストを呼んで講演や対談・インタビューなどを行う昼間の本会企画と、夜に旅館で行う合宿企画の二部構成が通例である。
sen.e: Usually, it consists of two sessions, one being a scheme of plenary session in the daytime where mainly writers and critics are invited to deliver lectures or join conversations or interviews, and another being a scheme of lodging session held in the evening at ryokan (a Japanese style hotel).

Usually, it consists of two sessions, one being a scheme of plenary session in the daytime where mainly writers and critics are invited to deliver lectures or join conversations or interviews, and another being a scheme of lodging session held in the evening at ryokan (a Japanese style hotel).

Usually, it consists of two sessions, one being a scheme of plenary session in the daytime where mainly writers and critics are invited to deliver lectures or join conversations or interviews, and another being a scheme of lodging session held in the evening at ryokan (a Japanese style hotel).

sen.j: 年によって、本会後に合宿を行う年と、合宿を先に行い翌日の朝から本会を行う年がある。
sen.e: Depending on the year, a lodging session is held after a plenary session, or a lodging session comes before a plenary session to be held from the morning on the following day.
Depending on the year, a lodging session is held after a plenary session, or a lodging session comes before a plenary session to be held from the morning on the following day.
Depending on the year, a lodging session is held after a plenary session, or a lodging session comes before a plenary session to be held from the morning on the following day.

sen.j: 合宿企画では各部屋に分かれてSFに関連した（あるいは、関連したと称する）様々な催しが行われる。
sen.e: The scheme of lodging session is held in each hotel room performing various events associated with SF (or self-proclaimed to be associated with SF).
The scheme of lodging session is held in each hotel room performing various events associated with SF (or self-proclaimed to be associated with SF).
The scheme of lodging session is held in each hotel room performing various events associated with SF (or self-proclaimed to be associated with SF).
History:
History
History

sen.j: 1982年 当時京都大学SF研究会に在籍していた大森望らにより第１回が開催される。
sen.e: In 1982, the first convention was held by Nozomi OMORI and other fellows who were then members of SF Kenkyukai (a study group of SF) at Kyoto University.
In 1982, the first convention was held by Nozomi OMORI and other fellows who were then members of SF Kenkyukai (a study group of SF) at Kyoto University.
In 1982, the first convention was held by Nozomi OMORI and other fellows who were then members of SF Kenkyukai (a study group of SF) at Kyoto University.

sen.j: 以後、毎年秋に京都市内で開催されている。
sen.e: Since then, the convention has been held every autumn in Kyoto city.
Since then, the convention has been held every autumn in Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: cityの頭文字を大文字に変更
sen.e: Since then, the convention has been held every autumn in Kyoto City.
